channel.title: ~~items are nulled on server/ client~~
channel.description: ok im trying to fix my nulls. i would like to know every file to edit to fix this problem. i have edited (server side) items.cfg, (client side) items.txt . what else do i need to know to fix nulls ?

item.title: ~~items are nulled on server/ client~~
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

It’s mostly the ID’s on your client look around and you’ll notice some of your client ID’s don’t match your servers. Also, just find the nulled objects ID and search on client files

Read full topic

item.title: ~~items are nulled on server/ client~~
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I presume you’ll need the correct model for it or else it’ll be nulled, and also added to your client by typing something similar to “add model ####”, I think that’s what you type in anyway.

Read full topic
